title: Lag and reconnects?
body:
Last game was absolutely miserable. 
Both my internet and ping were normal but the game kept lagging, freezing and giving me those attempting to reconnect messages. In the middle of a ranked game, too. Just my like. Is the server shitting itself or am I the only one who had the misfortune of being screwed over by these issues?

It is not a problem on my end.
I've checked connection, nothing is updating, ping is usual, last games were just fine.

Ugh, how unlucky...

replies.body:
Hey EugeneSims, 

Wasn't seeing any Server issues today and if you're unsure about it, you can always look here first: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na

As far as your lagging issues, you may want to try troubleshooting and seeing if that corrects the issue. That way it doesn't happen in the future at a critical time: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Hope this helps you out! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
